members.name: focus
members.descriptionHtml: Sets focus to the focus zone.

members.name: focusInput
members.descriptionHtml: Set focus to the input

members.name: items
members.descriptionHtml: Gets the current value of the input.

tables.name: IBasePickerStyles
tables.descriptionHtml: Represents the stylable areas of the control.

members.name: input
members.descriptionHtml: Refers to the input were to type new selections(picks).

members.name: itemsWrapper
members.descriptionHtml: Refers to the items already selected(picked).

members.name: root
members.descriptionHtml: Root element of any picker extending from BasePicker (wraps all the elements).

members.name: screenReaderText
members.descriptionHtml: Refers to helper element used for accessibility tools (hidden from view on screen).

members.name: text
members.descriptionHtml: Refers to the elements already selected(picked) wrapped by `itemsWrapper` along with the input to type new selection.

tables.name: IBasePickerSuggestionsProps
tables.descriptionHtml: Subset of picker options that may be legally passed through a picker to its internal Suggestions component.

members.name: aria-label
members.descriptionHtml: Screen reader label to apply to an input element.

members.name: defaultVisibleValue
members.descriptionHtml: The default value to be visible when the autofill first created. This is different than placeholder text because the placeholder text will disappear and re-appear. This text persists until deleted or changed.

tables.name: IPickerItemProps
tables.descriptionHtml: PickerItem props common for any type of items.

members.name: componentRef
members.descriptionHtml: Optional callback to access the IPickerItem interface. Use this instead of ref for accessing the public methods and properties of the component.

members.name: index
members.descriptionHtml: Index number of the item in the array of picked items.

members.name: item
members.descriptionHtml: The item of Type T (Persona, Tag, or any other custom item provided).

members.name: key
members.descriptionHtml: Unique key for each picked item.

members.name: onItemChange
members.descriptionHtml: Internal Use only, gives a callback to the renderer to call when an item has changed. This allows the base picker to keep track of changes in the items.

members.name: onRemoveItem
members.descriptionHtml: Callback issued when the item is removed from the array of picked items.

members.name: removeButtonAriaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: Aria-label for the picked item remove button.

members.name: selected
members.descriptionHtml: Wether the picked item is selected or not.

tables.name: ValidationState
tables.descriptionHtml: Validation state of the user's input.

members.name: invalid
members.descriptionHtml: User input is invalid.

members.name: valid
members.descriptionHtml: User input is valid.

members.name: warning
members.descriptionHtml: User input could be valid or invalid, its state is not known yet.
